name: Auto Filter Bot V2
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or t.me/apiidhashbot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or t.me/apiidhashbot

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Generated From t.me/tgsessionstringbot
